measure_points.query: SELECT filter(average(numeric(message.message)), WHERE 1=1) as value from Log where appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and method.name  = 'executeTokenRequest'
SELECT filter(average(numeric(message.message)), WHERE 1=1) as value from Log where appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and method.name  = 'executeUserInfoRequest'

FROM BrowserInteraction SELECT filter(average(timeToDomInteractive), WHERE 1=1) as value WHERE appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and targetUrl = 'https://partner.hpe.com/web/prp'
SELECT latest(statusValue) as statusValue FROM WorkloadStatus WHERE entity.name = 'PartnerReadyPortal(PRP)-PROD_Infra'

SELECT filter(apdex(duration, t:0.028), WHERE 1=1) as apdex, filter( average(duration), WHERE 1=1) as response,filter(percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true), WHERE 1=1) as error from Transaction WHERE appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production'

touchpoints.value: # of User Impacted due to Failures

measure_points.query: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction where appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and request.uri='/group/prp' and numeric(http.statusCode) >= 500
FROM BrowserInteraction SELECT filter(average(timeToDomInteractive), WHERE 1=1) as value WHERE appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and targetUrl = 'https://partner.hpe.com/'

select percentage(count(result), where result = 'SUCCESS') as success, max(duration) as request, max(durationReceive) as duration  from SyntheticRequest, SyntheticCheck where entityGuid = 'Mjc4MTY2N3xTWU5USHxNT05JVE9SfDVlNDIyOTNhLWIxZDItNGFjOC1iNGRkLTE5MjZiZTA4MzM1Yg'
FROM BrowserInteraction SELECT count(*) WHERE appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and targetUrl = 'https://partner.hpe.com/'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) FROM Transaction WHERE appName like '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and request.uri in ('/group/prp/esm/-/link/189005', '/group/prp/esm/-/link/179401', '/group/prp/esm/-/link/179301')
SELECT latest(statusValue) as statusValue FROM WorkloadStatus WHERE entity.name = 'PartnerReadyPortal(PRP)-PROD_Infra'

select percentage(count(result), where result = 'SUCCESS') as success, max(duration) as  request, max(durationReceive) as duration from SyntheticRequest, SyntheticCheck where entityGuid = 'Mjc4MTY2N3xTWU5USHxNT05JVE9SfDQ5YTMwMmMwLTM4MTQtNDgxMS04YWYyLWM4NmY5MmFhODAxZA'

SELECT percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' 
and request.uri='/q2cwngq/selfservice/getEmptyQuote'

SELECT filter(apdex(duration, t:0.028), WHERE 1=1) as apdex, filter( average(duration), WHERE 1=1) as response,filter(percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true), WHERE 1=1) as error from Transaction WHERE appName = '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) FROM Transaction WHERE appName like '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and request.uri = '/group/prp/tools-catalog'
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE appName like '210135-Partner Ready Portal (PRP)-Production' and request.uri = '/group/prp/tools-catalog'

SELECT percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) FROM Transaction WHERE appName ='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and
request.uri='/q2cwngq/opty/lookup'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND 
request.uri='/q2cwngq/itemDetail/getNewItemDetail'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND request.uri='/q2cwngq/ocaConfig/getBomByUcid' or request.uri='/q2cwngq/ocacomparison/checkifmerge' or request.uri= '/q2cwngq/importMultipleUcids' or request.uri='/q2cwngq/itemDetail/getBundleBOM'

from Transaction select percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) as percentage where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/qids/saveNewQuoteToQids'
SELECT latest(statusValue) as statusValue  FROM WorkloadStatus WHERE entity.name = 'NextGenerationQuoter-PROD_Infra'

select percentage(count(result), where result = 'SUCCESS') as success, max(duration) as request, max(durationReceive) as duration from SyntheticRequest, SyntheticCheck where entityGuid = 'Mjc4MTY2N3xTWU5USHxNT05JVE9SfDcxMGU2MmE3LTdhYTEtNGU3Yi1iMTlkLWY4OTQzNTQyODUyMw'

SELECT count(*)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499 and request.uri='/q2cwngq/qids/saveNewQuoteToQids'
SELECT count(*)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD'  and numeric(http.statusCode) >=500 and request.uri='/q2cwngq/qids/saveNewQuoteToQids'

SELECT filter(apdex(duration, t:0.028), WHERE 1=1) as apdex, filter( average(duration), WHERE 1=1) as response,filter(percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true), WHERE 1=1) as error from Transaction WHERE appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD'
SELECT count(*)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD'  and numeric(http.statusCode) >=500 and request.uri='/q2cwngq/qids/saveNewQuoteToQids'
FROM `LOGSER_INFORWARDER:IT_LOGSER` SELECT average(TIME_OUT - TIME_IN) as value where app_name='S4_ERP_DCP' WHERE UUID IS NOT NULL AND SRV_NAME IN ('ZMM_GW_PRODUCTS_MODEL_SRV') limit max

SELECT percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) FROM Transaction WHERE appName ='213679-Master Data Control Point - MDM-PRD' and request.uri like '%/organizationAccountV4WebService%'

select percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) as percentage from Transaction where appName in ('211240-ADDISON-Production-pricing-services', '211240-ADDISON-Production-pricing', '211240-ADDISON-Production-deal-services', '211240-ADDISON-Production-service-delivery') and (request.uri like '%/api/deal-offers%' or request.uri like '%/api/get-exchange-rate%' or request.uri like '%/api/get-ibp-exclusion%' or request.uri like '%/api/get-ibp-percentage%' or request.uri like '%/api/pricing/flexible-ibp%' or request.uri ='%/api/promotion-deals%' or request.uri like '%/api/search/products%' or request.uri like '%/api/v2/discount-indicators%' or request.uri ='%/api/v2/pricing/promotion-deals%' or request.uri ='%/api/v2/simulations/offer-prices%' or request.uri ='%/api/v3/simulate-sales-orders%')

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE error = false) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='213390-Cross-Category Cost Convergence-PRD' AND request.uri = '/C4OutputPort' and name = 'WebTransaction/Servlet/AxisServlet'

select percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) from Transaction where appName = '213083-Pricing Analytics-PRD-Optimus' and request.uri='/optimus/services/OptimusService'

from Transaction select percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) where appName in ('213083-Pricing Analytics-PRD-PPSS','213083-Pricing Analytics-PRD') and request.uri='/axis2/services/PricingService'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='213049-CORONA-PRD' AND request.uri like '%quoteServices/WriteQuoteService/jacksonJson%'

SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499 and appName LIKE '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqpricing/refreshOptimusWithSH'
SELECT latest(statusValue) as statusValue  FROM WorkloadStatus WHERE entity.name = 'NextGenerationQuoter-PROD_Infra'

select percentage(count(result), where result = 'SUCCESS') as success, max(duration) as request, max(durationReceive) as duration from SyntheticRequest, SyntheticCheck where entityGuid = 'Mjc4MTY2N3xTWU5USHxNT05JVE9SfDRlNWMxNjEyLWRjNTYtNDVlMC1hZjkwLTA1NDliODJmZGRmZQ'
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE numeric(http.statusCode) >=500 and appName LIKE '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqpricing/refreshOptimusWithSH'

SELECT filter(apdex(duration, t:0.028), WHERE 1=1) as apdex, filter( average(duration), WHERE 1=1) as response,filter(percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true), WHERE 1=1) as error from Transaction WHERE appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD'

SELECT percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqpricing/getDealRegBenefits'
SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction WHERE numeric(http.statusCode) >=500 and appName LIKE '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqpricing/refreshOptimusWithSH'

select average(TIME_OUT - TIME_IN) as value FROM `LOGSER_INFORWARDER:IT_LOGSER` where app_name='S4_ERP_DCP' and SRV_NAME IN ('Z_OFFERPRICE_CPQ_SRV', 'Z_SOURCE_CHANGE_TO_S4_OM_SRV', 'ZSA_GW_GET_IBP_EXC_S4_SRV', 'ZSA_GW_GET_IBP_PER_S4_SRV','ZOM_GW_IBP_FLEX_S4_SRV', 'Z_PROMO_DEAL_REQUEST_ODS_SRV', 'Z_DEAL_NON_DISC_FLAG_ODS_SRV', 'Z_PROMO_DEAL_ID_PRICING_ODS_SRV', 'Z_OFFER_PRICE_FROM_S4_R2_OM_SRV', 'Z_SO_SIMULATE_NGQ_TO_S4_SRV', 'ZMM_GW_PRODUCTS_MODEL_SRV') WHERE UUID IS NOT NULL

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND  request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqpricing/preCompleteCheck'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND  request.uri = '/q2cwngq/ngq/ngq/bundleCheck'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND  request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngq/ngq/submitToClic'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD'  and request.uri ='/q2cwngq/prevalidation/dataCheck'

SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' AND request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqedm/createDealWin'

SELECT percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and  request.uri='/q2cwngq/ngqaction/updateQuote'

SELECT count(*)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/qids/saveNewQuoteToQids' and numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499
SELECT latest(statusValue) as statusValue  FROM WorkloadStatus WHERE entity.name = 'NextGenerationQuoter-PROD_Infra'

select percentage(count(result), where result = 'SUCCESS') as success, max(duration) as request, max(durationReceive) as duration from SyntheticRequest, SyntheticCheck where entityGuid = 'Mjc4MTY2N3xTWU5USHxNT05JVE9SfDRlNWMxNjEyLWRjNTYtNDVlMC1hZjkwLTA1NDliODJmZGRmZQ'
SELECT count(*)  FROM Transaction where appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cwngq/qids/saveNewQuoteToQids' and numeric(http.statusCode) >=500

SELECT filter(apdex(duration, t:0.028), WHERE 1=1) as apdex, filter( average(duration), WHERE 1=1) as response,filter(percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true), WHERE 1=1) as error from Transaction WHERE appName = '212948-Next Generation Quoter-PRD'

FROM `LOGSER_INFORWARDER:IT_LOGSER` SELECT average(TIME_OUT - TIME_IN) as value where app_name='S4_ERP_DCP' WHERE UUID IS NOT NULL AND SRV_NAME IN ('ZOM_GW_CREAT_DEAL_S4_R2_SRV') limit max

FROM Transaction select percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) WHERE appName='211240-ADDISON-Production' AND request.uri LIKE '%customer-preference%'

FROM Transaction select percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) WHERE appName='213051-Next Gen Quote-To-Order Conversion Engine-PRD' and request.uri='/q2cngom/qtco/emdm/getlocation' or request.uri='/q2cngom/qtco/emdm/lookup' or request.uri='/q2cngom/qtco/emdm/search'

FROM Transaction select percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) WHERE appName='213051-Next Gen Quote-To-Order Conversion Engine-PRD'  and request.uri='/q2cngom/qtco/ws/cto/convert'
SELECT latest(statusValue) as statusValue FROM WorkloadStatus WHERE entity.name='NextGenerationQuoterConvert-PROD_Infra'

SELECT filter(apdex(duration, t:0.028), WHERE 1=1) as apdex, filter( average(duration), WHERE 1=1) as response,filter(percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true), WHERE 1=1) as error from Transaction WHERE appName='213051-Next Gen Quote-To-Order Conversion Engine-PRD'
FROM Transaction select percentage(count(*), where numeric(http.statusCode) >=200 and numeric(http.statusCode) <=499) WHERE appName='213049-CORONA-PRD' and request.uri LIKE '%/readquote/jacksonJson%'
